Seems like this is it.

  # TODO(zhengxq): for some reason, 'gcc' needs this help to find 'as'.
  # Need to investigate and fix.
  cmd = 'PATH=' + PREFIX_DIR + ' ' + cmd
  if log: Log(cmd)
  return os.system(cmd)
body:
Seems like [this is it](
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.0/third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc.tpl#L230).
```
  # TODO(zhengxq): for some reason, 'gcc' needs this help to find 'as'.
  # Need to investigate and fix.
  cmd = 'PATH=' + PREFIX_DIR + ' ' + cmd
  if log: Log(cmd)
  return os.system(cmd)
```
